text: My problem with this game?  It easily could've been one of the best sonic games ever, but they caved into fan pressure and other crap and released it prolly 6 months too early at least.  The form of the game we got was in all honesty what should've been an early beta version.  Had they just waited til the damned thing was actually done, it likely would have been cheered on across the world.  We all know what actually ended up happening though.
